lead_paragraph: The attacks in the Bronx and Brooklyn late Saturday and early Sunday were a reminder that violent pockets remain in the city, even as it has grown safer.

headline.print_headline: In 6 Hours,  4 Are Killed in Shootings Across City
headline.main: In 6 Hours, 4 Are Killed in Separate Shootings in New York City

snippet: The attacks in the Bronx and Brooklyn late Saturday and early Sunday were a reminder that violent pockets remain in the city, even as it has grown safer.
abstract: New York Police Dept reports four deaths in separate shootings across city within six hours; no arrests have been made in any of the four killings.
